description:
Compare multiple analyzed apps side-by-side.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Create app/compare/page.tsx
- Create components/ComparisonTable.tsx:
  - Select 2-4 apps from previously analyzed
  - Matrix view: features as rows, apps as columns
  - Highlight shared vs unique features
  - Design comparison: colors, typography, patterns
- Create components/AppSelector.tsx:
  - Multi-select dropdown
  - Shows app icon and name
  - Max 4 selections
- Save comparison to Supabase app_comparisons table
- Export comparison as markdown

Use Claude to generate insights about similarities and differences.
